message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase it. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8750.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm still a bit above your last offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer it to you for $9250. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $8900.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $9400. What do you think?
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $9050.
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. I can offer it to you for $9600. This is my final concession. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. My final counteroffer is $9500.
